1: <pb/><e>A ton bit eb yinatil Coré ti'</e> <pb/><t>A Dios ayoc jenelok, a' c'apax ayoc jipomalok. A Cham chi oc jetok yet ay co cawxinakil.</t>
2: <t>Tix wal yuj tu' xan c'am chon xiwi. Caxc'al mi chi tziclay paxay tx'otx' tx'otx' ti', cax chi paxay witzlak yul yich a' mar,</t>
3: <t>caxc'al mi chi bil a' mar cax chi aj chulnaj sat a', caxc'al mi chi tziclay witzlak yuj yowal a', palta c'am chon xiwi.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Ay jun a' miman aej chi ak'on tzaloj c'ul eb cajyom bay conob Dios, a ton is cajlobal Cham Axac'al Ocok.</t>
5: <t>A Dios ayic' nan conob tu', cax chi alay oc yip yuj. Chi oc Dios yetok, yet chi sakbi.</t>
6: <t>Ok el yaw mimek conoblak cax ok bilaj nacionlak. Ok uljoktok tx'otx' tx'otx' yet ok ablay yul is nuk' Dios.</t>
7: <pb/><t>A Jehová Cham Yajaw yin masanil ayic' jetok. A Diosal jichmam Jacob ayoc jetok, cax a' ayoc jenelok.</t>
8: <pb/><t>Ul ilek tzet yetal c'ayubtak max yun Cham bay yiban tx'otx' tx'otx' ti'.</t>
9: <t>Mayal c'aychaj el owal yuj, masantac'al bay lajub yulyibank'inal. Max k'ajcantok is julbal eb yuj Cham. A ch'en lanza max coc'axtok yuj. Max yacan oc k'ak'al carruaje yet owal.</t>
10: <t>Chi yal Dios bay nacionlak: Bekek e yak'on owal. Ojtaknejek elok tol ayin ton Dios in. Ok al-lay el in mimanbilal xol masanil nacionlak bay sat tx'otx' ti', ẍi Dios.</t>
11: <pb/><t>¡A Jehová Cham Yajaw yin Masanil ayic' jetok! ¡A Diosal jichmam Jacob ayoc jetok, a' ayoc jenelok!</t>
